item.description:
Hey everyone!

We are definitely back in our spot at the Deomocracy Center for a Friday edition of the Incubator. They had Thursday booked this week but Friday was free on their calendar and now its ours!!!

So come start the weekend with a smile!

If you weren't at our last Incubator at this new location, the space is fantastic and we are lucky to have it so let's make sure we treat it well.

If you can't make it on time, my phone number will be posted oustide on the door as it locks. When I answer you say the password is.....just kidding, no passwords. If you don't have a phone just knock on the door loudly and be patient, we should be able to hear it.

Any other questions or concerns, let me know.

And remember this is for Friday at 7:30, not Thursday.

Rock on!

Jason J.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be in character, get it!
item.name: Incubate the beginning of your weekend!
